Title: Microsoft Media Platform Video Editor
Description: The MMP Video Editor is a browser based video editor that consumes all Silverlight supported codecs and produces a project file that can be transformed into an EDL or to a Smooth Streaming Composite Stream Manifest (CSM).
HomeWiki:
Project Description (MMP Video Editor)
The MMP Video Editor is a browser based video editor that consumes all Silverlight supported codecs and produces a project file that can be transformed into an EDL or to a Smooth Streaming Composite Stream Manifest (CSM).

We are publishing the latest MMP Video Editor source code in the MSDN code samples gallery at http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/MMP-Video-Editor-472a92fe

If you want to download legacy releases of the MMP Video Editor, they are still available on the MSDN Archive site at http://archive.msdn.microsoft.com/VideoEditor.
